message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $150 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the value of this product to me is quite high.  I could let it go for $165, but that's the lowest I'm willing to go.

Thanks for your response, Alice. I've found another seller willing to offer the product for $155. Considering my budget constraints, I'm unable to meet your current offer. I hope we can reach a mutual agreement soon.
